title: Large East Side Brick Bungalow w/Finished Basement
posting_body: 3 Bedroom Brick Bungalow in the 48224 Area of Detroit.
This home is conveniently located near schools, 2 hospitals, Interstate 94 and more.
The fully finished basement is perfect for extra living space or rec area.
The main floor has hardwood and tile flooring which makes for easy cleaning.
All the windows are covered with newer blinds.
Outside is a nice front porch, a large fenced yard and a 1 car garage.
